AbstractMethodError().Description: Constructs an AbstractMethodError with no detail message.

AbstractMethodError(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs an AbstractMethodError with the specified detail message.

ClassDesc: Thrown when an application tries to call an abstract method. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can only occur at run time if the definition of some class has incompatibly changed since the currently executing method was last compiled.
